Module booking.springboot.restserver
Package booking.springboot.restserver

Class UsersController

java.lang.Object
booking.springboot.restserver.UsersController
@RestController public class UsersController extends Object
The controller for User objects.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      @PostMapping("/users/{username}/{firstName}/{lastName}/{password}/{gender}") public void createUser(@PathVariable String username, @PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName, @PathVariable String password, @PathVariable String gender)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to create
      firstName - The first name of the user to create
      lastName - The last name of the user to create
      password - The password of the user to create
      gender - The gender of the user to create

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") public List<booking.core.User> getAllUsers()
      Gets all users in the system.
      Returns:
      All users in the system

    • getUserByUsername

      @GetMapping("/users/{username}") public booking.core.User getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username)
      Gets a user by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to get
      Returns:
      The user with the given username

    • getBookingsByUsername

      @GetMapping("/users/{username}/bookings") public List<booking.core.Booking> getBookingsByUsername(@PathVariable String username)
      Gets all bookings for a user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to get bookings for
      Returns:
      All bookings for the given user

    • updateUserByUsername

      @PutMapping("/users/{username}/{firstName}/{lastName}/{password}/{gender}") public booking.core.User updateUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username, @PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName, @PathVariable String password, @PathVariable String gender)
      Updates a user by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to update
      firstName - The first name of the user to update
      lastName - The last name of the user to update
      password - The password of the user to update
      gender - The gender of the user to update
      Returns:
      The user that was updated

    • bookRoomByUsername

      @PutMapping("/users/{username}/book/{roomNumber}/{from}/{to}/{totalCostOfBooking}") public void bookRoomByUsername(@PathVariable String username, @PathVariable int roomNumber, @PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate from, @PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate to, @PathVariable int totalCostOfBooking)
      Books a room by its room number.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user booking the room
      roomNumber - The room number of the room to book
      from - The start date of the booking
      to - The end date of the booking
      totalCostOfBooking - The total cost of the booking

    • cancelBooking

      @PutMapping("/users/{username}/cancel/{roomNumber}/{from}/{to}/{totalCostOfBooking}") public void cancelBooking(@PathVariable String username, @PathVariable int roomNumber, @PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate from, @PathVariable @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate to, @PathVariable int totalCostOfBooking)
      Unbooks a room by the booking.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user unbooking the room
      roomNumber - The room number of the room to unbook
      from - The start date of the booking
      to - The end date of the booking
      totalCostOfBooking - The total cost of the booking

    • deleteUserByUsername

      @DeleteMapping("/users/{username}") public booking.core.User deleteUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username)
      Delete sa user by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to delete
      Returns:
      The user that was deleted
